messages.messageBody:
Ren Allen wrote:

> Ok, now I'm going to give Danielle and Rue a hard time. I went off to
> Always Unschooled, found out their site had been chosen for "Natural
> Child Project" parenting resource of the month AND, when I go to
> Natural Child Project, there's an article by RUE KREAM!!!
>
> Sheesh you guys, we DO like to hear about this stuff. Congratulations!
>
Awww, shucks! I'm blushin'! Just glad to be o' service, m'am. A
compliment on my organization, Deb posting my "Principles" article...now
this.

I should hang out here more often. ;)

--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (7), Sam (5)
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

messages.subject: Natural child project
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, now I m going to give Danielle and Rue a hard time. I went off to Always Unschooled, found out their site had been chosen for Natural Child Project
messages.messageBody:
Ok, now I'm going to give Danielle and Rue a hard time. I went off to
Always Unschooled, found out their site had been chosen for "Natural
Child Project" parenting resource of the month AND, when I go to
Natural Child Project, there's an article by RUE KREAM!!!

Sheesh you guys, we DO like to hear about this stuff. Congratulations!

On top of that, was a WONDERFUL interview with Alice Miller about the
roots of violence. ANyone that thinks tv or video games or play guns
can make children be violent, REALLY need to read this article!!

http://www.naturalchild.org/alice_miller/roots_violence.html

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
